es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.charts

Class AmChartsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.controllers.charts.AmChartsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AmChartsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Controller of AmCharts. Details of AmCharts and its properties in AmCharts API. This class save charts created in app.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
